tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    defect_type VARCHAR(50),
    defect_description TEXT,
    defect_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
  qc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT NOT NULL,
  qc_date DATE NOT NULL,
  qc_result BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  qc_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE defects (
  defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  defect_type VARCHAR(50),
  defect_description TEXT,
  defect_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  product_description TEXT,
  manufacturing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(50),
  process_description TEXT,
  process_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE defects (
  defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defect_type VARCHAR(50),
  product_id INT,
  defect_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100),
  product_category VARCHAR(50),
  manufacturing_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE manufacturing_processes (
  process_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  process_name VARCHAR(100),
  process_description TEXT,
  responsible_employee VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE defect_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  defect_id INT,
  product_id INT,
  process_id INT,
  tracking_date DATE
)
